Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of five lines of Greek text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393874) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393874)
Almásy-Martin 2020 / Demotic, Greek and Coptic ostraca from Abydos in the British Museum (fig.30)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.BM Abydos Gr. 4 (Edition abbreviation according to Oates et al. 2001)
